data.summary-venue: Dublin Square, Phoenix Market City: Kurla

data.info-subtitle: Enjoy this movie from the comfort of your home and use BookMyShow to watch the most popular digital premiers.

components.text: Download the M-Ticket on your mobile. Show the QR code at the cinema entrance.
Pick up your tickets from the box office.

1. Delivery fee will be applicable.

2. Customer(s) will be informed once delivery is initiated by our logistic partner via  e-mail/sms.

3. Customers) will receive their tickets between 1 week to 2 days prior to the event. If however, due to unavoidable circumstances, tickets) cannot be delivered via mail, we will intimate customers) with details of where they can collect their tickets) on or before event day, and a refund of the delivery fee would be remitted to the customers).

4. In case an Office Address is given for delivery and the courier agent is not allowed on the premises, the ticket(s) may be delivered to the reception or mail room.
₹280.50 will be deducted from Amazon Pay Later.

dynamicForms.title: To proceed, please enter the mobile number linked to your Google Pay account
